headline: Why APA (APA) Is Up 5.2% After Returning to Profitability and Raising Production Guidance
summary: APA Corporation reported third-quarter 2025 results on November 5, highlighting revenue of US$2.02 billion and net income of US$205 million, a return to profitability compared to a net loss for the same period a year earlier. An accelerated timeline for cost reductions and the raising of U.S. oil production guidance for the next quarter reflect improved operational efficiencies and financial discipline across the company’s core assets. With APA exceeding production guidance and advancing...
